reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater pretty, flattering, and well-fitting, with one mentioning the sleeves are long enough for taller women. They appreciate its warmth and texture, with one noting it's very soft. The knit quality receives mixed feedback, with some describing it as a great cable knit sweater while others report issues with seams coming unraveled around the neck. The color accuracy also gets mixed reviews, with

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally a sweater that doesn't make me look bulky!
items.body: Most baggy tunic sweaters make a person look fatter than they really are, bur this is the first one I don't have to return! Just the perfect amount of flattering that doesn't hug tight, or look like a tent. I'm keeping this one! Bought for a cold night football game coming up & this will be perfect under my light windbreaker. Nice high turtleneck to keep my neck warm and long enough sleeves to come down my hands if I want. Highly recommend this one! :) Read more
items.author: Mrs. Mc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Cable Knit Sweater!!!
items.body: Perfect cable knit sweater without being super thick. I purchased this for my upcoming trip to Iceland. Very versatile piece and doesn't take up much packing space. I have worn it layered with a black vest and leather Spanx and it looks adorable. I have also wore it with jeans, brown leather belt and leopard flats, it looks adorable that way as well. I highly recommend and will be purchasing in additional colors to go into my wardrobe capsule. Read more
items.author: Wifey

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dark Olive
items.body: The color is a very dark olive green, darker than advertised. Very pretty, but darker than anticipated. Read more
items.author: L. Johnston

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, cozy, comfy
items.body: 5’8” 155#, I bought the black in a Medium. Love it! Feminine, pretty. This one’s a keeper. The sleeves are long enough for us taller girls. Read more
items.author: Barbara Jean

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Eh…
items.body: I wanted to love this sweater however the color online seems more of a pale blue. What I received was a brighter, more sky blue. In the pictures, the neckline seems kind of relaxed but it fits more like a turtle neck. Haven’t worn it out so cannot attest to the warmth but it is soft. Read more
items.author: Rebecca L Hughes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this sweater
items.body: I get so many compliments when I wear this sweater. I got one in the green and one in the white. They’re very soft they fit is true to size. They wash and dry well. Read more
items.author: Tericia Rasmussen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Second purchase
items.body: These are very nice sweaters. Keeps you warm but not bulky. Read more
items.author: Jen

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poorly made
items.body: Beautiful sweater but it’s defective and poorly made. First time I took it out to wear and discovered the seam coming unraveled around neck. So disappointing. Read more
items.author: Firnest

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, B1-wine Red, 10 Christmas Tree, 06 Red, 08 Sky Blue, B1-dapricot, Apricot, 09 Dark Blue, Black, Red, 03 Brown, 01 Beige, 05 Green, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
